title: The Strongest Link
description: The much anticipated sequel to The Weakest Link.After leaving Stacy incarcerated for eight years in a maximum security military facility, MI6 now find that she is the only person who can help them, but will she?To get her life back, Stacy must trust the very people who betrayed her so badly in the past. Fighting the memories of her previous encounters with them as she struggles to come to terms with her new found freedom.If she has any chance of success, she must relive her darkest nightmares, calling on her deepest reserves, relying on strengths she never realised she possessed, in order to suceed.
author: T.A. Lean
